adverbs.description: unlaudably (comparative more unlaudably, superlative most unlaudably)

entries.meaning: (rare) In a way that is not laudable.
examples: Erasmus maintains that he has no intention of condemning the zeal of those who, not unlaudably, exercise their powers of intellect in subtleties of this kind; but he is convinced that the gospels and epistles are the best sources  […]
